page.title: 16BRAISWICK FARM
page.content: Braiswick Farm covers the area between Mile End and Colchester Golf Club in Braiswick. It is an arable farm and has fields of barley wheat and beans. To the north of the farm is alarge area devoted to the growing of roses These rose fields are owned by a large nursery they attract many visitors and are an extremely colourful sight when they are all in bloom. A public footpath leads round the fields to give access to West Bergholt and Braiswick.At the beginning of the path on Mile End Road there is a small War Memorial commemorating the deaths of local people killed in the two world wars.
